verbs.description: italy [V: is] giving away over 100 castles for free italy is giving away more than 100 historic castles farmhouses and monasteries for free in an effort to breathe new life into its disused public buildings ministry of tourism croatia state property agency mayor daniele galliano roberto reggi sardinia
